hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #5# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a single #scrub in the crater# sells #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that in the castle courtyard you can see a portrait of a young Talon.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Mask of Truth# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Top

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Song of Time# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: I came here to chew bubblegum and play rando. And I'm all out of bubblegum.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #2# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that racing #Damp√©'s ghost# rewards...^ #a Spirit Temple Small Key# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Saria's Song#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Deku Shield#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Heart Container#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Epona's Song#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the path to Termina is a one-way trip.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Bottom

ToT (Right).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Saria's Song#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Shadow Temple#.
